options.content:
### VM Optimization Playbook

1. Track `neo_vm_trace_hot_ratio` to identify contracts with sustained hot opcode windows.
2. Review `plugins/OTelPlugin/profiles/vm-superinstructions.json` for generated super-instruction candidates.
3. Feed accepted sequences into your JIT/super-instruction pipeline or bake them into JumpTable extensions.
4. Watch `neo_vm_superinstruction_plan_count` to confirm the planner is capturing new opportunities.
